website_summaries.verdict: A large stainless steel bottle that is still lightweight and easy to clean.
pros: Comes in 40 and 64 ounce sizes with a leak-proof cap
Wide design makes it easy to clean and to add ice cubes
Can boil water in this bottle if needed
cons: Dents more easily due to single-walled design
Doesn't insulate as well as the double-walled versions

customer_reviews.title: Everyday item that cannot be underestimated...
customer_reviews.text: 2 years, dropped a thousand times, no leaks, use it daily, original cap, & is the best thing I've bought to drink enough water every day. I'm a tow truck emergency services driver & I carry this daily. Its easy to get into the soda routine all day every day but carrying this every day for over 2 years makes drinking enough fluid easy. I've bought one for home as well...never had any issues with these. Easy to clean, never leaks, takes a serious beating, & it's as important as my wallet & keys every day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottles, now with a stronger base design
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Klean Kanteen and got rid of all my plastic containers about 14 years ago. I recently bought 2 to replace a couple my gf banged up and dented (not too bad but i like my stuff cleaner than that). These newer ones have a redesigned base, and they have done a great job of strengthening the base area without adding any weight. They take careless dropping better now.
customer_reviews.author: netzien

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT leakproof. Every time I close it I make sure that the seal is firmly into its place. This bottle constantly leaks and I even make sure not to fill it all the way to the top. My other metal canister that is NOT from this brand never leaks. This brand is very disappointing. It is very annoying to have a bottle that constantly leaks.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Very useful bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it camping, working in the yard and even for storage in the kitchen. It is study, lightweight for it's size and does what I need it to. It is NOT a thermos but then again I can't sit my thermos close to the fire to heat water, accidentally drop it off the roof without it breaking or warmed my toes by putting it (with hot water inside) in a sleeping bag when out camping. I did all those things with my Klean Kanteen Wide Mouth water bottle. This bottle is a hard worker for sure and has many uses. Very happy I bought it. In fact, I plan on buying several more to share with family/friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Overall I really like it. Take into account this is single walled ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like it. Take into account this is single walled so it will not stay cold forever like a “YETI” or off brand double walled cup will. I bought this as part of a survival bag I’m putting together and the fact that it’s metal and single walled will allow me to boil water in it if needed. The cap locks up secure and there is a rubber seal that prevents leaks. If I could complain about anything I would say I wish the opening was a little more rounded and not so sharp. It’s not a problem but a rounded edge would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great for the role.
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for a stainless bottle that could double as a water boiling tool but also had the capacity to hold a fair amount of water. Before this I had settled on the nalgene stainless bottle 32oz with a stainless camp cup nestled on it. But then saw a few outdoor youtubers use this as their primary water carrier and boiler that caught my attention. 2 liters with a removable cap. I am sold.
customer_reviews.author: AntTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly fine water bottle for hiking and traveling
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger metal water bottle for hiking and traveling. I settled with 40 oz since that seemed like a good capacity without being unwieldy. The bottle doesn't leak and is reasonably durable (banged on some walls and dropped on some rocks). While the water bottle works, it's not exactly the best value out there since there are insulated stainless steel bottles with the same capacity for a similar price. However, if you want to be able to put your stainless steel bottle through the dishwasher and have the ability to put your bottle over a fire to boil the water, this bottle is better.
customer_reviews.author: mhwwdman

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless option!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I purchased to 40 oz. It does not leak. I chose single wall stainless so I could boil water in it if I had too. It is perfect for hikers or for folks who just want a versatile container to keep liquids in.
customer_reviews.author: KC Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it m!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle . But there is room for improvement . For example , the edge of the bottom of the bottle is “curvy”, hence it is not very steady when it stands.
customer_reviews.author: Deltium

customer_reviews.title: Nice Container
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my plastic water bottles so I'm not taking in micro plastics. These bottles work with Katadyn water filters so you can ditch the Nelgene bottle. The non insulated bottle is fairly light. This its not 100% stainless steel (see video). Only the bottom of the bottle is stainless steel so it may corrode/rust.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not a normal container
customer_reviews.text: You have to supply your own insulation if you want to keep liquids cold or hot: think of a Koozie or an insulated container or wrap. The upside is that you can directly put this container over a campfire, stove, etc and boil water. It has no plastic in the container, so the stainless steel doesn't put a flavor in your drink. Finally, you can drop it and not worry about a vacuum seal inner insulation layer breaking and ruining the container: it is durable. Good for camping, for hiking, for survival bug out bags.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is awesome. I drink about 3 of them a day, and I carry this thing every where. It’s not heavy like many reviews said, and I’m pretty scrawny so that’s saying a lot. It keeps my water cold, wouldn’t say super freezing, but it’s not room temp either. I like it, it’s a nice water bottle, and it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with ding
customer_reviews.text: Great utility and value with Klean Canteen. This will serve as camp potable water bottle and backup cook pot for bike touring. Item arrived super packed inside paper filled box with bubble wrap tightly taped to bottle but damn if there is a dime sized ding about 1" below shoulder. It will probably experience more dings with use but when I buy something new I expect it to be cherry. Not so here.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bottle, Meh Cap
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is as good as everyone claims. However, the plastic cap that comes with it is not that great. Maybe it's just mine, but my cap is really tough to twist onto the bottle. Almost seems like the inner threads on the cap isn't meant for the outer threads on the bottle. Kind of annoying since there's no way I could set this thing down on a surface (even if it's full of water) & twist the cap off with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rushil Randive

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and doesn't keep beverages cold.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a replacement for a similar Kleen Canteen model that I had for 2 years and loved but lost. Well it wasn't. It leaked all over everything. It didn't keep beverages cold either. So I am returning it and purchasing another model that will HOPEFULLY work as well as my lost one.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t drink and drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I wouldn’t have to take two water bottles with me when heading out for the day. However I am finding that I actually drink less water now because this bottle is difficult to drink from. I need to use both hands to drink from it and keep it relatively leveled to get the cap on securely. As a mom of 3 small kids that does a lot of things one handed this just isn’t ideal. Forget about drinking from this while driving. I actually have to buckle it in my front seat so it’s not rolling around the car. Lol
customer_reviews.author: OG_mama4

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Single walled stainless steel container
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for use is your hiking/emergency pack. Its single walled construction makes it great for boiling water if needed and its plastic cap has a removable rubber seal ring to ease cleaning and keep your purified water inside the container while you are on the move. The cap is plastic but has a stainless steel liner so your liquids never touch plastic. Obviously dont put the plastic cap back on the container right after you have boiled water in it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why but it is leaked since my first use. When I incline it 45° down it is leaking.. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PruneAndLeo

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love Klean Kanteen but this 2018 model leaks unfortunately. Looks like the silicone is missing from the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Gergo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but holds a day's worth of water. Although it's only single-walled, it seems to keep cool temperatures for a while (perhaps because of the large volume of the water, and the fact, of course, that light doesn't pass through it). I wish there was a sport cap for these wide mouth bottles, since they take some care to drink from, if one doesn't want a waterfall splashing down his or her face).
customer_reviews.author: dz

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what expected, well done
customer_reviews.text: Good size, doesn't weigh much and looks good. Could be easier to drink from, but that is just from the wide mouth, which I prefer for camping. Tends to spill a bit when drinking if shaky or moving or just not careful. Condensation is a bit of a problem if you use cold drinks, but that is just because it isn't insulated I imagine. In all, great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Max Persons

customer_reviews.title: dents
customer_reviews.text: Kleen Kanteen is of course a good product, but the one I got has label goo on the side, and an extra label on the bottom that covered yet another label and, worse, covered two rather serious dents! With some work, I can remove all the label goo, but the dents certainly shorten the useful life of this product.
customer_reviews.author: leaker

customer_reviews.title: Very utilitarian bottle
customer_reviews.text: Put on stickers and it'll make it more attractive if you're into that. I drink a lot of water so I need a bottle for my dehydration needs. Aside from this, this bottle is also durable and lightweight. When I fill it with water, it becomes a great self-defense tool. I've taken this with me when I work outside and for long commutes. It's become a key thing to bring.
customer_reviews.author: NateQMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice price and quick delivery. I love your product, most of the water bottles out there are plastic which are made using chemicals that I have no desire to put into my body. Stainless steel is the way to go. Very durable and easily maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley M. Frezza

customer_reviews.title: Not insulated
customer_reviews.text: This is not an insulated bottle. It will not keep your beverage cool or hot...the description correctly states single walled construction that I should have noted as I wanted a insulated bottle. Otherwise it is a good bottle with large opening and leak proof seal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Starke

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, sturdy uninsates bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite water bottle so far. It seals better than the camelbacks and is about the same weight. Only the 27 oz is the same width as the cap, but it holds enough water for me and the steel feels very sturdy. I haven’t boiled water in it yet, but I will try that soon, as Klean Kanteen says I can do it with this single-wall bottle with the lid off. It keeps cold water pretty cold, even without insulation. I haven’t tried any hot beverage in it, but I don’t recommend it because the steel will probably heat up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: an orchestral and jazz bassist

customer_reviews.title: We Shall See
customer_reviews.text: The main reason that I bought a single wall stainless bottle was for water purification in the fire for bushcraft. In the ‘instructions’, it says not to heat over open flame. Reviews said that it works fine, time will tell when I test it in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've put these through hell and back, being an EDC item. Recently had to replace the last one after slipping and falling back on a set of stairs in a Tokyo train station. The 40oz klean kanteen in my backpack breaking my fall at nearly 300lbs. Needless to say it it was smashed in. Love these great customer support, just wish they were a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Themoyouno

customer_reviews.title: Rough & Tough break for camping or on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I had my Klean Kanteen for about a year now and I love it so much that I had to buy four more. One for every bag that i own.
customer_reviews.author: G & G

customer_reviews.title: Big and can stick in the fire.
customer_reviews.text: I moved to the desert, and now take two of these for day hikes (I'm pretty big, so lose water in windy 100+ heat). Have dropped it many times on rocks and it just builds its character. I just get this type since for camping you can stick in the fire to boil water. It is not insulated, so if you want it cold fill it halfway the night before and put in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wright

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big and it holds plenty! I added a paracord handle to it and inserted a rubber straw. Not much for keeping things cold (I just mean that because it’s single walled it gets warmer quicker—I didn’t buy it for keeping water ice cold) but it does keep things hot (after boiling water in it etc).
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all day hydration
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! It helps me drink enough water a day at work without having to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great single wall bottle
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find for my backpack. Since it is single-walled I can put it right on the fire to purify water.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, use it around the house and have used it to boil water when backpacking. Not double insulated so it'll sweat but for the price, size, and weight it's a great backpacking jug
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s pictured.
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE SAME AS PICTURED. Doesn’t matter how good the product is, If you don’t get what’s pictured, it’s a 1 star review. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Francis

customer_reviews.title: Typical Kleen Kanteen. Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical kleen kanteen product! Well built, good value for the money and looks like it will last a long time. The only thing I would add is a silicone lid leash.
customer_reviews.author: NoNameJoe

customer_reviews.title: In theory, should be good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the inside of the lid was also stainless Steel. It is hard to find, most lids are all plastic. Single wall so only good for cold liquids. The big downer was that the white wrap around label near the base of the container was tape/glued to the container itself. So in working at getting that sticky film off of the container I now have a marked up product that I haven’t even used yet! Not amused and having second thoughts about ordering a larger one from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Going straight in my bag! Weighs hardly anything but pretty dang big. Fits in my bottle pouch nicely too. Single wall for boiling water, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Any modern water bottle that still leaks is a fail.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fortune, the first

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle
customer_reviews.text: Being a single wall stainless steel bottle it is best to get a insulated carrier for it. When you need to boil water for drinking this bottle works extremely well. It will dent if dropped, and if you torque the cap down it can be a bit difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Cenobite

customer_reviews.title: Useful Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is well built. It arrived with a small dent in the bottom, most likely from shipping,
customer_reviews.author: TennTraveler

customer_reviews.title: product arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the same canteen, 8 years old. I'm unsure if I will keep it as it arrived dented on bottom so does not stand balanced on flat surface
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and it has worked well for the month or so I have owned it it has not leaked yet unbeknownst to me at the time I can buy the identical product in Walmart camping section for $12 less I will do this next time
customer_reviews.author: Louise Foote

customer_reviews.title: Great for green tea
customer_reviews.text: I put in 5 bags of green tea and fill it with boiling water at night. By morning it's cooled off and ready to take to work for the day.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great kanteen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kanteen, already taken on hike and works great. Single walled so it will sweat, fits the Condor water bottle carrier nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Use every day in construction work. Suprised that it stays relatively cool considering how hot my work truck gets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big mouth nice!
customer_reviews.text: Big mouth nice! Doesn't splash back in your eye like the lil mouth.Still like my lil mouth too though, had it for 5 years, not as pretty, but still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water bottles, this one is a great size.
customer_reviews.text: These water bottles area excellent. I use them daily. Never leak. For real This size with the small mouth is also a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle to have for bikepacking and bushcraft. Fits in bottle cage. Single wall allows you to use it on a stove or over a fire to warm water for food or coffee. Great multi use item to have in your kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. This is great for say a day hike where you want water for coffee or hot chocolate plus water for the day. This bottle holds a lot of water!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 for each pack. they are very good quality. nice size. gonna get a couple more for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: elmo kazinski

customer_reviews.title: Leak in less than 04 months
customer_reviews.text: After having use this product around 04 months it starts leaking water. It's not recommended. It's not insulated. You'll get burned if you do not protect your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Lezama

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BOTHER!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! Cap doesn’t screw on straight, the outside is wet because it’s NOT insulated and just reads “cheap” - extremely disappointed and returned immediately! Read my other review for a great water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a single wall stainless bottle that I can boil water in, and this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Huge dent
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a huge dent. Shipping box was fine. How does something like this get past quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Clo

customer_reviews.title: I like this better than my Hydroflasks 😬
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Hydroflask to Klean Kanteen because the Klean Kanteen is lighter to carry, and works just the same. Keeping things cold for VERY long periods of time and keeping things hot just as easy!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Price

customer_reviews.title: Leaks unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Great size, but it leaks pretty bad. The rubber seal is far from airtight. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Double wall, wide mouth is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Keeps liquids hot/cold for a long time. Wide mouth is easy to handle & easy to drink from. Loop on lid can we used with clip to secure to pack or wherever.
customer_reviews.author: FrazeThatPays

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this Kleen Kanteen.
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth edges. Easy to clean when you follow their directions. It fits nicely in my molle bottle bag along with a disinfection kit.
customer_reviews.author: 🙊🙉🙈

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose water bottle
customer_reviews.text: A very useful item. Use it in get home bags / bug out bags! You can cook in these in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: KayakFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I use it for camping. I collect water from the river or stream and put the bottle over the fire and boil the water and after it cools down I’m good to go. Love it
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably inside pathfinder bottle bag. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great single wall canteen!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I bought the single wall version with no coating for boiling water in a fire during camping or a survival situation. It Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I will use this as part of my GO BAG emergency kit. It holds 40 ounces of water an will fit a filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Twait

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday, just bought another for husband, he loves it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Great product but started leaking in less than a week
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to this bottle so much and loved it the first few days but before a week had passed it started leaking. Very disappointed on this product. Would love to know if there was a fix for this kid leaking after such a short amount of time. If it wasn't because of that this review would have been five stars for sure because the shipping was fast and the product if it worked as intended is great.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for hiking, I’m going to boil water in it soon.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Tons of capacity, and very water tight!
customer_reviews.text: As a few other reviewers have suggested, the top can a little finicky (somewhat difficult to start the threads) **at first**, but breaks in quickly. I love this bottle! I have several Klean Kanteen wide mouth bottles, and believe this to be the most water-tight version I own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific bottle. I just wish that the cap itself could also be made of stainless. Highly recommended otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Commercialphoto32

customer_reviews.title: Works and cleans great, but dents easier than I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cleans easily and robust. Dents easier than I would like, but single walled and doesn’t affect function.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mieczkowski

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: It's big but a great source to carry water and boil water in
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pence

customer_reviews.title: thank you for your truth in advertiseing
customer_reviews.text: IN the latest heat wave [ 100 and over] I use it every day thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lee larson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good water bottle, but the fact that it is only single-wall leads to a HUGE problem with condensation on the outside. The top is decent but I still find that it leaks sometimes. I still use it almost every day but I’m sure there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: abbey

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Husband is happy with it. Holds enough water for the work day.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Dents easy does not keep water cold.
customer_reviews.text: Dented bottom first time I dropped it, now it sits wobbly. I didn't think it would dent so easily. Also even with ice, my water only stayed cold for about an hour. I realize it doesn't state anywhere that it does keep drinks cold but it would be nice if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean than most I suppose. Be easy with the cap gasket when you remove it to clean. It will tear. Lost my first one on the job site. Missed it enough to get another. Gotta have my homemade electrolytes.
customer_reviews.author: tylor

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: The cap is quick to lose its water tight seal with the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, good for camping and sure it will last for long
customer_reviews.author: Louis Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Ice please
customer_reviews.text: Wide mouth is a must, no longer worry about whether ice will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Local is Best

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my emergency pack``
customer_reviews.text: I've seen this in a few videos and felt it would be a great addition to my emergency pack, and it is. It fits perfectly in the stainless drinking cup. I haven't used it yet, can't wait to boil water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Henslee

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this on March 12,2019. First trip it cracked about one inch from the bottom. Very very disappointed. The “return window” is closed so I guess I am out the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying it so far! I will update if any problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: tftMom

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: family fights over it so I need to order another one on the sly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: As a mom, I need something that could hold up to my kids. I believe this water bottle could be ran over and barely dented. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that this did not meet my needs. It is very difficult to fit the lid on straight to screw it closed
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, it dented very easily and difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Kacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with plenty of water to transport during long hikes to stay hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Large canteen, excellent fit n finish.
customer_reviews.text: 64 oz Kanteen is large enough for outdoor activities and is a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: JCUJR

customer_reviews.title: Tough little bottle
customer_reviews.text: We have several kleen Kanteen bottles all ready in various sizes and configurations. All very tough, light and easy to clean. This one will live in my EDC bag. We keep one in our vehicles with a filter too.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Provost

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in a pack. Add a pathfinder nesting cup for small cook Set
customer_reviews.author: Alexander m.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and like all the other Klean Kanteen products, is super durable! I like that it’s not too huge to fit in the car cup holders we have.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Quality stainless steel water bottle, just the right size for my edc pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. its massive but it doesn't look ridiculous, it actually looks classy. its a little heavy, but nothing the average person cant lift. also the lid is perfect to hold, just stick two fingers in there and they slide on in for perfect grip. I had one of these before, but i lost it, and i would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle, seals perfectly and has perfect lid with D ring for transport
customer_reviews.author: Charity Rael

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: The picture here is false advertising, it shows the 40oz container that I was expecting but sends you the 27oz that clearly looks different. 2 stars just because the false picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price. Good way to lug water around without paying for environmentally unfriendly plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi Stone

customer_reviews.title: Its stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I like the hook on the lid and that its 40 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Michael lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, lightweight, solid cap.
customer_reviews.text: So far I don't have any dislikes. It's easy to clean and take on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I have about 3 of these and love them. Totally recommend these wide mouth if you’re an ice cube lover.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Henson

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle for work
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended Klean Kanteen to me when I needed a new water bottle for work. This is legit. I like the handle and it cleans very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Klean Kanteen Wide Mouth Single Wall Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Leak Proof Stainless Steel Interior Cap - 64oz - Brushed Stainless, Model Number: 1003122
feature_bullets: ✔ DURABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT - Lightweight SINGLE WALL water bottle design is perfect for everyday hydration when at work, on the trail or on vacation. Water bottle is lighter due to being NON-INSULATED.

✔ LEAK PROOF & ALL STAINLESS - Comes with LEAK PROOF loop cap made from BPA-free, leach free, polypropylene #5. Cap has a stainless steel bottom insert creating an ALL STAINLESS STEEL interior so your liquid doesn't touch plastic.

✔ EASY TO USE & VERSATILE - Large 2. 125 inch (54 mm) opening fits ice and is easy to fill and pour. All stainless steel SINGLE WALL water bottle construction with no coatings means it can be used to boil water when needed for sterilization.

✔ HIGH QUALITY & EASY TO CLEAN - All Klean Kanteens water bottles go through extensive quality control to ensure the HIGHEST QUALITY materials and construction. This means all seams, threads and stainless steel finishes are smooth and easy to clean.
✔ LIFETIME - Our lifetime STRONG AS STEEL is our promise to making a truly superior product that we stand behind in the occasion you get a product that doesn't meet our standards.
